entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as staring in shock between two Mooods, indicating his presence and reaction to the situation.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is mentioned twice, once sleeping in a trunk and once unconscious on the floor. This indicates that there are two instances of Moody present.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as climbing into the trunk and examining Moody, indicating his presence and actions in the scene.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is mentioned as someone who will need to see the imposter's body, indicating her role in the story.

entities.name: imposter
entities.description: The imposter is described as freezing and needing a cloak, indicating their presence and vulnerability.

relationships.description: Harry stared at the two Mooods in shock.
Harry threw the imposter's cloak down to cover them.
Dumbledore covered Moody with the cloak.
